# ziti_posture_check_domains (Data Source)

Ziti Posture Check Data Source, type: Windows Domains check

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "ziti_posture_check_domains" "test_posture_check_domains" {
  name = "test_domains"
}

output "ziti_check_domains" {
  value = data.ziti_posture_check_domains.test_posture_check_domains
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) Identifier
- `name` (String) Name of the Posture Check

### Read-Only

- `domains` (List of String) Windows Domains list
- `role_attributes` (List of String) Role Attributes
- `tags` (Map of String) Posture Check Tags
